20101221151415.000|20101221151417.000|CC1|SHE KNOWS WHERE THE BONES ARE

20101221154525.000|20101221154527.000|CC1|15 FEET IN AFRICA, WEIGH CLOSE  
20101221154527.000|20101221154530.000|CC1|TO 2,000 POUNDS, HAVE THOUSANDS 
20101221154530.000|20101221154532.000|CC1|OF POUNDS OF PRESSURE PER SQUARE
20101221154532.000|20101221154532.000|CC1|INCH IN HIS JAW.
